item.description:
Hola,

Join us Sunday, July 29th for a Fiesta en la Playa Fund Raiser at the Battistoni Beach at Lake Garda near Karen and Paul's home. Come at 2 p.m. to swim, kayak, canoe, fish, chat, rest, relax, and chat some more. For directions, go to www.googlemaps.com and enter 3 Colony Road, Unionville, CT. At the end of Colony Road is a white, sandy beach with tall pine trees and picnic tables. There is parking along the street and by the beach. Bring swim suits and towel, your canoe or kayak (we have a few to share) and food or beverages to share.Family member are welcome. Please bring $5 to donate toward the cost of the Spanish Meetup website! Don't forget the beach toys!! Questions? Call me at 860-922-7997 (cell) or 860-673-9678 (home). The rain date is Sunday, July 29th. !Hasta luego!
item.how_to_find_us: If you are having trouble finding us call the phones belowHola, Join us Saturday, July 28th for a Fiesta en la Playa Fund Raiser at the Battistoni Beach at Lake Garda near Karen and Paul's home. Come at 2 p.m. to swim, kayak, canoe, fish, chat, rest

item.name: Fiesta en la Playa
